featured.text: Some parents try to get rid of half of the candy after their children go to bed, but dentists say parents also need to separate the good kinds of treats from the bad.
If children really love candy, dentists recommend that they eat chocolate instead.
According to pediatric dentist Dr. Kaneta Lott, the most damaging stuff is something that is sticky or very hard and thus stays in the mouth for a long time.

definition.zh_def: 牙醫，專門診治牙齒和口腔健康的醫療專業人員。
definition.en_def: A dentist is a medical professional who specializes in the diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases and conditions of the teeth and gums.
definition.example: I have an appointment with the dentist to get my teeth checked.
